title: ‘It Was a Suicide Move’: Van der Poel, Evenepoel Awed by Pogačar’s 100km Worlds-Crushing Attack
content:
Van der Poel and Evenepoel can only tip their hat: 'With any normal guy, 100km is too far. But Tadej this year is not normal.'

Read the full article at ‘It Was a Suicide Move’: Van der Poel, Evenepoel Awed by Pogačar’s 100km Worlds-Crushing Attack on Velo.
author: ahood
